item.title: 民调显示欧洲央行降息结束，通胀率将保持在 2% 左右
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲中央银行已经完成了降息，新的预测将确认通胀率在中期内将保持在目标水平。【原文：The European Central Bank is done lowering interest rates, with fresh projections set to confirm inflation will hold at target over the medium term, a Bloomberg survey showed.】

item.title: 韩华海洋关联公司出售 10 亿美元股份后股价上涨三倍
item.description: 韩华海洋株式会社（Hanwha Ocean Co.）的一家附属公司出售了其在韩国造船厂的股份，筹集了约 1.4 万亿韩元（10 亿美元）的资金，而该公司的股价在过去一年中上涨了两倍多。【原文：A Hanwha Ocean Co. affiliate sold its stake in the South Korean shipbuilder, raising about 1.4 trillion won ($1 billion), after the company’s shares more than tripled over the past year.】

item.title: 前首席经济学家称日本央行 10 月利率难以确定
item.description: 日本央行前首席经济学家表示，市场对日本央行可能在10月份加息的猜测越来越多，这低估了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税竞选活动所带来的不确定性程度。【原文：Growing market speculation over a potential Bank of Japan rate hike in October is underestimating the degree of uncertainty wrought by Donald Trump’s tariff campaign, according to a former BOJ chief economist.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉两架飞机飞越美国船只，紧张局势加剧
item.description: 据五角大楼称，两架委内瑞拉军用飞机飞越了海岸附近国际水域的一艘美国海军舰艇，这是继美国打击一艘据称从委内瑞拉运载毒品的快艇之后，两个对手之间的关系再次升级。【原文：Two Venezuelan military aircraft flew over an American naval vessel in international waters off the coast, according to the Pentagon, a fresh escalation between the two adversaries after the US struck a speedboat purportedly carrying drugs from the country.】

item.title: 铁矿石将实现周度上涨，利润率和供应成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于对中国恢复生产的预期提振了市场情绪，铁矿石自 7 月份以来首次连续一周上涨。【原文：Iron ore was headed for its first back-to-back weekly gain since July, as expectations of production resuming in China boosted sentiment.】

item.title: 嘀嗒的竞争对手小红书预计利润将增至三倍，达到 30 亿美元
item.description: 小红书科技股份有限公司（Xiaohongshu Technology Co.【原文：Xiaohongshu Technology Co. is on track to triple its profit to $3 billion this year, making progress with commercialization on the way to a potential public listing.】

item.title: 人工智能投资热潮让东京电子成为市场落后者
item.description: 全球人工智能投资热潮正在迅速改写半导体行业公司的命运。东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）就是其中的佼佼者。【原文：The global artificial intelligence investment frenzy is fast rewriting the fortunes of companies in the semiconductor industry. One notable laggard is Tokyo Electron Ltd.】

item.title: 菲律宾通胀趋缓或将支持更多货币宽松政策
item.description: 菲律宾 8 月份通胀加速，但仍低于中央银行的目标范围，这为货币当局在今年进一步降低关键利率提供了灵活性。【原文：Philippine inflation accelerated in August but remained below the central bank’s target range, giving monetary authorities flexibility to reduce the key interest rate further this year.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，OpenAI 将与博通公司合作，于 2026 年设计出自己的人工智能芯片
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引熟悉双方合作的未具名人士的话报道称，OpenAI 正准备在博通公司的帮助下，于 2026 年设计并生产出自己的人工智能芯片。【原文：OpenAI is preparing to design and produce its own AI chip with help from Broadcom Inc. in 2026, the Financial Times reported, citing unidentified people familiar with that tie-up.】

item.title: 香港的数字债券市场随着新债券的发行而蓬勃发展
item.description: 最近几天，香港掀起了一股所谓的数字债券发行热潮，这表明人们对使用区块链技术的证券越来越感兴趣。【原文：A wave of so-called digital bond issuance in Hong Kong in recent days is showing rising appetite for the securities that use blockchain technology.】

item.title: 特朗普签署关税减免令，日本汽车股受提振
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普签署行政命令，确认美国对汽车行业的关税限制在 15%以内的协议后，日本汽车股在东京攀升，提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Japanese auto shares climbed in Tokyo after Donald Trump signed an executive order confirming a deal that limits US tariffs on the sector to 15%, lifting investor sentiment.】

item.title: 花旗与瑞银在执法 "冲刺 "中解决 CFTC 合规索赔问题
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会称，花旗集团和瑞银集团等几家公司同意支付总计 830 万美元，以了结该委员会就合规相关违规行为（包括记录保存和报告失误）提出的索赔。【原文：Units of Citigroup Inc. and UBS AG were among several firms that agreed to pay a total of $8.3 million to settle US Commodity Futures Trading Commission claims over compliance-related violations including recordkeeping and reporting lapses, the derivatives regulator said.】

item.title: 铜、基本金属在美国就业数据和美联储会议前下跌
item.description: 铜和其他基本金属持稳，因为投资者在等待周五公布的美国关键就业数据，这些数据可能会影响美联储下一步的利率行动。【原文：Copper and other base metals were steady as investors awaited key US payrolls figures due on Friday that may influence the Federal Reserve’s next moves on interest rates.】

item.title: 中国基金经理将慢牛希望寄托在政府身上
item.description: 中国投资者相信政府会让股价缓慢而稳定地上涨，他们相信，过去的繁荣和萧条时期已经为监管机构提供了抵御股价大幅波动所需的工具。【原文：Chinese investors are putting their faith in the government to engineer a slow and steady rise in share prices, betting that previous periods of boom and bust have given regulators the tools needed to push back against wild price swings.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Klar 通过收购 Bineo 在银行执照争夺战中迎头赶上
item.description: 墨西哥金融科技公司 Klar 旗下的一个部门已就收购 Banorte 金融集团旗下的数字银行 Bineo 达成协议，此举使其更接近获得银行牌照。【原文：A unit of Mexican fintech Klar has entered an agreement to buy Grupo Financiero Banorte’s digital bank Bineo, a move that brings it closer to operating with a banking license.】

item.title: 国债交易员等待可能左右美联储押注的薪资报告
item.description: 债券和货币交易员正在为周五的美国就业报告做准备，该报告将巩固对美联储政策的看法，并决定近期的利率轨迹。【原文：Bond and currency traders are bracing for Friday’s US employment report, which stands to solidify views on Federal Reserve policy and determine the near-term trajectory of interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "相当可观 "的芯片关税将 "很快 "出台
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将 "很快 "对半导体进口商品征收关税，但不包括苹果公司等承诺增加美国投资的公司的商品。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would be imposing tariffs on semiconductor imports “very shortly” but spare goods from companies like Apple Inc. that have pledged to boost their US investments.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟起诉人工智能初创公司，称其盗用超人形象
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. sued AI startup Midjourney alleging theft of its intellectual property, saying the company allowed customers to generate images and videos of characters like Wonder Woman and Superman without permission.】

item.title: 日本工资创七个月来最大增幅，为加息提供支持
item.description: 日本工人的名义工资增长速度为七个月来最快，实际工资今年首次出现增长，这支持了日本央行在未来几个月考虑加息的理由。【原文：Japanese workers’ nominal pay rose at the fastest clip in seven months, with real wages increasing for the first time this year, supporting the case for the Bank of Japan to consider a rate hike in the months ahead.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议前紧张局势加剧，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 石油连续第三天下跌，在欧佩克+（OPEC+）会议召开之前，石油将出现单周下跌。【原文：Oil fell for a third day, heading for a weekly decline ahead of an OPEC+ meeting that may see the group sign off on another supply hike.】

item.title: 麦格理以 3.1 亿欧元收购葡萄牙医院集团股份
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）已同意以 3.1 亿欧元（3.61 亿美元）的价格收购葡萄牙医院运营商 Luz Saude SA 40% 的股份，这标志着该澳大利亚集团向欧洲日益增长的私营医疗保健行业的最新进军。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. has agreed to buy a 40% stake in Portuguese hospital operator Luz Saude SA for €310 million ($361 million), marking the Australian group’s latest push into Europe’s growing private healthcare sector.】

item.title: 中国财报显示 2.7 万亿美元股票涨势不稳
item.description: 中国企业第二季度的表现呈现出一个严峻的现实：缺乏盈利证明，无法为股价大涨提供理由。【原文：Chinese companies’ second-quarter performance renders a stark reality: earnings proof to justify a blistering stock rally is missing.】

item.title: 亚洲将在就业数据公布前加入全球股市反弹行列：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市和债券大涨之后，亚洲股市周五早盘有望上涨，因为劳动力市场降温的进一步迹象增强了美联储将在本月降息的赌注。【原文：Shares in Asia were poised for early gains Friday after stocks and bonds rallied on Wall Street as further signs of a cooling labor market reinforced bets the Federal Reserve will cut rates this month.】

item.title: Onex 首席执行官称有人向他提出出售信贷部门的股份
item.description: Onex Corp. 首席执行官表示，该公司已收到一些公司的询价，希望购买其信贷部门的股份，他认为该公司的股价没有正确反映出该业务的价值。【原文：Onex Corp. has received inquiries from firms wanting to buy a stake in its credit division, its chief executive officer said, as he argued that the company’s share price doesn’t properly reflect how valuable that business is.】

item.title: 反对党领袖称加入日本执政集团困难重重
item.description: 一个规模虽小但很有影响力的反对党的联合领导人认为加入日本执政联盟 "非常具有挑战性"，并补充说他不同意政府提供现金援助的计划。【原文：The co-leader of a small but influential opposition party described joining Japan’s ruling coalition as “very challenging,” adding that he did not agree with the government’s plan to provide cash hand-outs.】

item.title: 银行为与甲骨文有关的数据中心准备 380 亿美元债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司和三菱日联金融集团公司正在主导一项约 380 亿美元的一揽子债务计划，为甲骨文公司位于威斯康星州和德克萨斯州的数据中心提供资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. are leading a roughly $38 billion debt package to fund data centers connected to Oracle Corp. in Wisconsin and Texas, according to people familiar with the matter.】
